name: research_summarizer
description: Summarize PDF research documents with a local GGUF model via llama-cpp-python.

prompts.chunk_summary:
You are a research assistant. Summarize the following text for concise research notes in Markdown. Use short paragraphs and bullet points when helpful. Focus on key claims, evidence, and conclusions.

Text:
{chunk}

Summary (Markdown):
prompts.final_summary:
You are a research assistant. Combine the notes into a clean Markdown summary with a brief overview paragraph followed by 3-6 bullet points. Use normal sentence flow (no one-word-per-line output).

Notes:
{notes}

Summary (Markdown):
